name: Port Adelaide Backpackers
description:
Port Adelaide Backpackers are an awesome value for money hostel with multiple free car parking spots nearby.  We are not far from the beach, free WiFi, free pool table

We are a clean, fun and friendly budget hostel in the heart of historic Port Adelaide. With all the banks, supermarkets, pubs, shops you could possibly need. 

Only minutes away from Port river, dolphins and beautiful semaphore beach. All of our private rooms and most of our dorms are air-conditioned/heated. 
Private and family rooms with double, queen and bunk bed options, so they can accommodate from one to six people in comfort. Just let us know when you book and we are happy to arrange the room to suit your needs. 

All private rooms with tv, dvd, bar fridge. We have a movie room( 50 inch tv with over 200 movies free dvds) huge dining hall, coin laundry, outdoor smoking courtyard and free BBQ and all of this is only a short train ride from Adelaide city central train station( 20 minutes) secure lockers, cameras and combination locks assure your privacy and safety whilst staying with us.

Our friendly staff are more than happy to assist you while you are staying at Port Adelaide Backpackers. Our virtual receptionist are on duty from 8:00 Am- 9:00 Pm, so whenever you go to the reception there is always someone there happy to help you. They are skyped in from overseas and they are fully trained professionals, with years of experience in the hospitality industry.

•Guests MUST present valid Passport  upon Check-in. Failure to present valid documents will result in denied check-in with no refund.

•Please note if booking more than 1 person into a dorm room, we cannot guarantee you will be in the same room. We will however try our best.

•There is a strict NO REFUND policy for all 'In house guests' who have changed their mind or their travel plans and no refunds on bookings paid in advance.

•Please note if booking more than 1 person into a dorm room, we cannot guarantee you will be in the same room. We will however try our best.

Please note that in Port Adelaide Backpackers all of our bookings are Non-refundable 
* The guest will be charged the total price if they cancel anytime. 
* The guest will be charged the total price anytime.

**Please note that a 2% credit card fee for all credit card transaction is charged.**
**Please note there will be a $2 transnational service fee when paying for the remainder of your stay via Credit or Debit Cards**

Additional Information:
Standard check-in time is at 2:00 PM
Reception opens at 9:00 AM and closes at 9:00 PM
Our front doors will be closed at 10:00 PM and can only be opened with personal access codes given by the management on the day of your check-in.
